1.definition: to order with authority [the testatorthat the car go to his niece]
1.ed: that the car go to his niece]

2.definition: marked by absence of any intervening agency, instrumentality, or influence [ consequences]

3.definition: effected by the action of the people or the electorate and not by representatives [ democracy]

sub_terms.b: being or passing in a straight line from parent to offspring[a ancestor] compare
